attributes.action: Scrap stamp duty for first time buyers if buying below the recorded average Land Registry price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the Government consider first time property buyers exempt from stamp duty should they buy below the recorded average price of a property - which according to Land Registry is currently £174,827 (February 2007)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
